item.description:
*** CANCELLED ***
Sorry, we could not get agreement with the town officers on this.

You are welcome to join us in the east for a day of working with Jacob Hornberger.

Anybody who wants to volunteer to follow up with them (for the next time - is welcome to do it).

So think about it.. where do a lot of people congregate regularly on weekends that isn't a mall, or a church?

Hint: It's a New England tradition, bringing the whole family together.

Guess yet?

Its the dump!

We're going to meet and greet folks, have some signs up, a table with some bumper stickers, flyers, the usual. It'll be a blast.

Come on out!
item.name: Meet and Greet at the Merrimack Transfer Station
